    Some Notes About How the Project Is Going

    This project actually started a long time ago before writing this post. However, I paused it for a while due to several reasons and challenges.

    Some of these struggles were related to the project itself, while others were personal. In this post, I want to focus on the project-related challenges and clarify a few things about the journey so far.

    Motivation

    I created this blog to document my journey in building this operating system from scratch.

    The main goal is to keep track of every step I take — from early experiments and learning phases to major updates and design changes. Whenever I modify something, improve a component, or face a challenge, I try to write about it here.

    This blog is not only a personal log but also a way to share knowledge with anyone who is interested in operating systems development and low-level programming.

    References

    This journey began with a strong passion to learn about operating systems and eventually build one for myself.

    I started searching for the required knowledge and found many useful resources. Based on several Reddit posts and technical blogs, I decided to begin with the x86 architecture and follow a structured learning path by watching this YouTube playlist to better understand x86 architecture: 8086 - Bharat Acharya

    In addition, I followed the main reference for operating system development: osdev.org

    And i also was reading these books :

    • Operating Systems: From 0 to 1
    • Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces
    • The Little Book About OS Development

    Some Thoughts

    This project represents my true passion and the field I want to pursue as a career.

    Even though the learning process includes many frustrating moments, I genuinely enjoy every step of it. One thing I would really love is to have people who share the same passion — whether by adopting the idea, giving feedback, or contributing in any possible way.

    So if you’re reading this right now and feel that you can offer something, I would truly appreciate it.

    Please check the Contributing Rules to learn how you can help.
